## 4. Action Items
Technical: Implement m3u8 player in WebView for better video streaming performance | Description: Replace direct m3u8 rendering on VideoScreen with m3u8 player in WebView for V1 | Mentioned By: ğŸ†‚ğŸ…´ğŸ…±ğŸ…¶ğŸ…°

The chat segment is extremely brief, containing only two messages from the same user (.hyp shaman). The user mentions finding a "decent example" of something previously discussed and shares what appears to be an image or link (not visible in the transcript). They note that it reminds them of "hyperfy's wind shader." There is no substantial technical discussion, problem-solving, or decision-making in this limited exchange.

The chat contains a very brief interaction where user Enryt acknowledges that with version 0.16 (presumably of a software application), they can now interact with "rocket.hyp", and they thank another user (referenced by Discord ID 179546010303856640). This suggests a previous issue with this interaction has been resolved in the new version. No technical details about the nature of the interaction or how it was fixed are provided in this limited exchange.

The chat contains a very brief interaction where user Enryt is responding to someone named Gert about an implementation issue. Enryt reports that on Quest 2 standalone, they cannot see video or buttons when using main branch 5d20037435 (dated 12/18/2025). Additionally, when using PCVR with Meta Horizon Link, they can see the video and buttons, but the buttons are not selectable/interactive. The message appears to be requesting help to make the implementation work properly in VR environments.
